about.title: About
about.description: I am a Civil Engineer graduated from UBA. I am eager to delve into the world of programming. My goal is to achieve the best possible outcome. I continuously strive to improve myself every day by seeking further education and development, both in my personal and professional life. I have knowledge of Python, Django, Javascript, Jinja, Bootstrap , MySQL, HTML5 and GIT.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Since I have been starting, this path, I have developed different web and desktop applications, which I show below.

lightApp.title: Light Consumption Application
lightApp.description_1: Desktop application for electric consumption control. The year is separate for bimesters. The first period starts the 24th december from the previous year.
lightApp.description_2: The program calculates the consumption by periods and by year. It graphs the last four years.
lightApp.description_3: I have used Tkinter of Python and the libraries of matplotlib, numpy, sqlite between others.

accountingApp.title: Accounting Application
accountingApp.description_1: Finances desktop application (spending, saving and investing). It is still development.
accountingApp.description_2: I have been using Tkinter of Python and the libraries of matplotlib, numpy, sqlite between others.

taskOrganizer.title: Task Organizer
taskOrganizer.description_1: Web application allows users to register various tasks, highlight important ones, and mark completed tasks.
taskOrganizer.description_2: I have been using Django, Javascript, Boostrap Jinja and MySQL.

ratioShare.title: Ratio Shares
ratioShare.description_1: Web application you can compare the prices between financial assets.
ratioShare.description_2: I have been using React, Python and Tailwind.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: You can contact me by writing aasecchi@gmail.com
